function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Enactment of changes to regulations governing interiors to align with social distancing recommendations","Impact":"Significant increase in building dimensions and footprints, affecting urban landscape space and density","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough impact assessments and urban planning to account for space requirements and population growth","Technologies":"Urban planning software, data analysis tools, and modeling software","People":"Urban dwellers, city planners, architects, developers, and policymakers","Owner":"City planning departments, governmental bodies, and urban development agencies"},{"Description":"Use of surveillance systems and tracking technology for outbreak control and deconfinement process","Impact":"Potential infringements on civil liberties, privacy concerns, and erosion of personal freedoms","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, transparency in surveillance use, and independent oversight of surveillance practices","Technologies":"Secure data encryption, privacy-preserving technologies, and oversight tools for surveillance activities","People":"General public, civil rights organizations, government agencies, and technology developers","Owner":"Governmental bodies, regulatory agencies, and technology oversight committees"}]}
